info.title: Flight Cheapest Date Search
info.description:
# Introduction

The Flight Cheapest Date Search REST/JSON API is an open search API that enables you to find the cheapest dates to a given city or airport.

The API returns cached prices from a large cache database which is continually updated with a large number of routes.
The response time is therefore very fast, however not all locations are available.

The API returns a list of flight-date options containing the flight dates and the flight price. Links to the Flight Offers Search API are also provided to allow you to confirm the price and availability of the fare.

# Authorization

Before using the API you will need to get an access token. Please read our **[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization)** for more information on how to get your token.

# Supported Operations

Resource: flight-dates

HTTP Method: GET

1.0.1: Clarified example for the parameters origin, destination and currency
Added links to ISO, IATA kind of references
1.0.4: Change link of FlightOffer from v1 to v2

get.summary: Find the cheapest flight dates from an origin to a destination.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description:
IATA code of the city from which the flight will depart

[IATA table codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) - e.g. MAD for Madrid

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description:
IATA code of the city to which the flight is going.

[IATA table codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) - e.g. MUC for Munich

parameters.name: departureDate
parameters.description: the date, or range of dates, on which the flight will depart from the origin. Dates are specified in the [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2017-12-25. Ranges are specified with a comma and are inclusive

parameters.name: oneWay
parameters.description: if this parameter is set to true, only one-way flights are considered. If this parameter is not set or set to false, only round-trip flights are considered

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: exact duration or range of durations of the travel, in days. This parameter must not be set if oneWay is true. Ranges are specified with a comma and are inclusive, e.g. 2,8

parameters.name: nonStop
parameters.description: if this parameter is set to true, only flights going from the origin to the destination with no stop in-between are considered

parameters.name: maxPrice
parameters.description: defines the price limit for each offer returned. The value should be a positive number, without decimals

parameters.name: viewBy
parameters.description: view the flight dates by DATE, DURATION, or WEEK. View by DATE (default when oneWay is true) to get the cheapest flight dates for every departure date in the given range. View by DURATION (default when oneWay is false) to get the cheapest flight dates for every departure date and for every duration in the given ranges. View by WEEK to get the cheapest flight destination for every week in the given range of departure dates. Note that specifying a detailed view but large ranges may result in a huge number of flight dates being returned. For some very large numbers of flight dates, the API may refuse to provide a response

total.description: Total amount paid by the user

currency.description: the currency in which the prices of the flight offers are returned. Currency is specified in the [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) format, e.g. EUR for Euro

Defaults.description: the query parameters for which default values were used are returned here

departureDate.description: the date, or range of dates, on which the flight will depart from the origin. Dates are specified in the [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2017-12-25. Ranges are specified with a comma and are inclusive

oneWay.description: if this parameter is set to true, only one-way flights are considered. If this parameter is not set or set to false, only round-trip flights are considered

duration.description: exact duration or range of durations of the travel, in days. This parameter must not be set if oneWay is true. Ranges are specified with a comma and are inclusive, e.g. 2,8

nonStop.description: if this parameter is set to true, only flights going from the origin to the destination with no stop in-between are considered

viewBy.description: view the flight dates by DATE, DURATION, or WEEK. View by DATE to get the cheapest flight dates for every departure date in the given range. View by DURATION to get the cheapest flight dates for every departure date and for every duration in the given ranges. View by WEEK to get the cheapest flight date for every week in the given range of departure dates

errors.title: NOT FOUND
errors.detail: no response found for this query parameter

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this error

title.description: a short summary of the error

source.title: Issue_Source
source.description: an object containing references to the source of the error

pointer.description: a JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request document

parameter.description: a string indicating which URI query parameter caused the issue

example.description: a string indicating an example of the right value

400.description:
code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------------------------- 
425     | INVALID DATE
477     | INVALID FORMAT
2668    | PARAMETER COMBINATION INVALID/RESTRICTED
4926    | INVALID DATA RECEIVED
32171   | MANDATORY DATA MISSING

404.description:
code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------------------------- 
6003    | ITEM/DATA NOT FOUND OR DATA NOT EXISTING
